tileentity.line: if (isTransformer(nbt['mID'])){return YELLOW+(nbt['mWorks']==0 ? Mode("降压模式"):Mode("升压模式"))}

if(nbt['mID']==32013){return YELLOW+nbt['height']+GOLD+' 层'+ "\\n"+"§d最低-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+AQUA+standards((nbt['mFloor']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d当前-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+YELLOW+standards((nbt['mKeV']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d最高-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+RED+standards((nbt['mCeil']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV' }
var hatchcolor = ['黑色','红色','绿色','棕色','蓝色','紫色','青色','淡灰','灰色','粉色','黄绿','黄色','淡蓝','品红','橙色','白色']; if(nbt['mColor']>0){return YELLOW+hatchcolor[nbt['mColor']-1]}
var CM = nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputcurrentCircuitMultiplier']; if (CM>=0){return GOLD+" 超 "+YELLOW+standards(CM)+GOLD+" 频 "}
AAeoh=nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputastralArrayAmount']; if (nbt['mID']==15410 && AAeoh!=0){return GOLD+" 数 "+YELLOW+standards(AAeoh)+GOLD+" 量 "}
PAeoh=nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputparallelAmount']; if (nbt['mID']==15410 && PAeoh!=0 && AAeoh!=0){return GOLD+" 并 "+YELLOW+standards(PAeoh)+GOLD+" 行 "}
var laodeng = nbt['eyeOfHarmonyOutputfluidOutput']['0fluidAmount']; if (nbt['mID']==15410 && nbt['mActive']==1){return laodeng>0?GOLD+"老登已经爆金币(产岩浆)":RED+"老登速速爆金币(产时空)"}

if (nbt['mID']==1145){return GOLD+'红石启动'+"\\n"+"§d传送坐标"+"\\n"+ "\\n"+"§6X:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+GOLD+nbt['mTargetX']+ "\\n"+"§6Y:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+GOLD+nbt['mTargetY']+ "\\n"+"§6Z:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+GOLD+nbt['mTargetZ']+ "\\n"+"§d目标维度ID"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+GOLD+nbt['mTargetD'] }

var Gent=['遏制','终极遏制','粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']>0 && (nbt['mID']==19010||nbt['mID']==19012)){return GOLD+"✦ "+Gent[nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']-1]+" ✦"}
var Gent=['时空扭曲','粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']>0 && (nbt['mID']==19046)){return GOLD+"✦ "+Gent[nbt['fieldGeneratorTier']-1]+" ✦"}
var fusionCoil = ['超导线圈','压缩聚变','进阶压缩聚变','MK-II原型','MK-II','进阶高能线圈']; if (nbt['mID']==19046 && nbt['compactFusionCoilTier']>0){return GOLD+"✦ "+fusionCoil[nbt['compactFusionCoilTier']-1]+" ✦"}
GentStab=['粗制','原始','稳定','先进','卓越','异星','完美','太初','鸿蒙']; if (nbt['tierStabilisationField']>=2 && nbt['mID']==19015){return GOLD+GentStab[nbt['tierStabilisationField']-2]}

if(nbt['mEUt']!=0 && nbt['mActive']==1)if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mStoredSteam']!=0 || nbt['mID']==19032 || nbt['mID']==19033 || nbt['mID']==31041 || nbt['mID']==31078){return YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt'])+WHITE+" L/t"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1154) if(nbt['superheated']==0){return GREEN+"蒸汽: "+YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt']) * 2+YELLOW+" L/t"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1154) if(nbt['superheated']==1){return GREEN+"过热蒸汽: "+YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt'])+WHITE+" L/t"}
if(nbt['mActive']!=0) if(nbt['mEUt']!=undefined) if(nbt['mID']==1020 || nbt['mID']==1021 || nbt['mID']==1022 || nbt['mID']==1023){return YELLOW+Math.abs(nbt['mEUt']) * 2+WHITE+" L/t"}
